spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Vince Migurdia is a 11th level spellcaster, his spellcasting ability is Intelligence (CD 15). He can cast the following spells as long as he wields his longsword.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Vince adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, Vince  must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon

reaction.name: Retreat
entries: As a reaction, Vince can move 10 ft. away from a creature that ended its turn 5 ft. away from it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Vince can make two weapon attacks or use a Lightning-Imbued Strike.

action.name: Longsword (Arcane Jolt)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d10 + 7}) slashing damage, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) force damage.

action.name: Dagger (Arcane Jolt)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) slashing damage, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) force damage.

action.name: Lightning-Imbued Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d10 + 7}) slashing damage, plus 14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) lightning damage, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) force damage plus {@h} 9 ({@damage 2d8}) lightning damage to another target within 5 ft. of it.

bonus.name: Dash
entries: Vince takes the Dash action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: Vince can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
